channel.title: Cannot connect a second time 562
channel.description: I'm useing the corruptionx client and Runesource 562 source. I can log in to my guy on my comp and open the server and the client. But i can't get the client to connect to the server a second time untill i log out and log back in. please help

item.title: Cannot connect a second time 562
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

most likely your gonna need corruption x source or
runesource client…if there is
because some files/dats or whatever wont go with the server

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot connect a second time 562
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Gpunks3:

I’m useing the corruptionx client and Runesource 562 source. I can log in to my guy on my comp and open the server and the client. But i can’t get the client to connect to the server a second time untill i log out and log back in. please help

I believe it’s a server-side problem.

There’s probably a setting in your server config that limits the number of clients per IP.

Read full topic
